Here's some things about "Red light, green light" in the video:
1. So to track everyone in the first game, Jimmy bought 60+ movement tracking cameras and got extra guards. 

2. There was a rumor that the first person to finish would get a Tesla (it turned out to be false), which is why people tried to be first.
3. The guy that was "nervous" wasn't actually nervous, people had to stand in one position in average of 5 mins, which made everyone tired, therefore he was shaking.
Pewds ongoing, "subscribe and you COULD win.." intonation play throughout this had me on the floor
They actually installed motion triggers for each and every player in red light green light, which is really impressive
